name: Youtube - Cosmic Panda Classic
description: Standalone style only for Youtube, from my previous work.
additional_info:
Made for this userscript ->
https://www.facebook.com/YouTubeCenter

2015.05.14.
Disable Resize in Youtube Center.

2015.04.29
Align fix

2015.02.27
sidebar left 650, top 400

2014.09.16
small top sidebar again

2014.09.10
small top sidebar

2014.08.31
Right sidebar

2014.06.06
Top -360

2014.02.21
Youtube theme update

2013.09.30
YT Center 2.0 upgrade, too bad they continued editing CSS, just to annoy me.

2013.08.21
Divs, again, I guess google employes don't know what they want.

2013.08.16
Youtube changed divs yet again.

2013.08.14
Small fix of video size.

2013.08.12
YouTubeCenter again, yeay. :)

2013.07.29
YouTubeCenter decided to manage the CSS -.- so I had to change a few lines.

2013.07.24
Youtube messed it up yet again, fixed most of the things

2013.05.28
Few minor change, youtube put back the linkable titles, they are colored now. And deleted the clickable title, because it drove me crazy. And now center the deleted videos too.

2013.04.07
Youtube changed a few things, again, and again, so I fixed it, and then fixed it again, and improved it. :)

2013.04.03
Fixed what YouTube changed (everything, total rework -.-)

2013.03.05
Removed old layout replaced with the new one. Fully updated, playlist is working without errors, fixed few padding/margin errors.

2012.11.05
Youtube updated the style, you can find the new style here

2012.07.28
Subscription button back

2012.03.10
Fixed title
